titleStmt.title: The summe of christianitie gatheryd out almoste of al placis of scripture, by that noble and famouse clerke Francis Lambert of Auynyon. And translatyd, and put in to prynte in Englyshe, by Tristram Reuel. The yere of our lorde. 1536
Farrago omnium fere rerum theologicarum. English
titleStmt.author: Lambert, Franz, 1486-1530.
Revel, Tristram.

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Farrago omnium fere rerum theologicarum.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
